parameters.name: expected_name

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A list of fields to include in the response.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A list of fields to exclude from the response.

artifact.title: Artifact
artifact.description: Artifact file representing the physical content

authors.description: A list of the CollectionVersion content's authors.

contents.description: A JSON field with data about the contents.

dependencies.title: Dependencies
dependencies.description: A dict declaring Collections that this collection requires to be installed for it to be usable.

description.title: Description
description.description: A short summary description of the collection.

docs_blob.title: Docs blob
docs_blob.description: A JSON field holding the various documentation blobs in the collection.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: The URL to any online docs.

homepage.title: Homepage
homepage.description: The URL to the homepage of the collection/project.

issues.title: Issues
issues.description: The URL to the collection issue tracker.

certification.title: Certification
certification.description: Indicates that the version is certified

license.description: A list of licenses for content inside of a collection.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: The URL of the originating SCM repository.

deprecated.title: Deprecated
deprecated.description: Whether or not the collection has been deprecated.

artifact.title: Artifact
artifact.description: Artifact file representing the physical content

base_path.title: Base path
base_path.description: The base (relative) path component of the published url. Avoid paths that                     overlap with other distribution base paths (e.g. "foo" and "foo/bar")

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: The latest RepositoryVersion for this Repository will be served.

client_url.title: Client url
client_url.description: The URL of a Collection content source.

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for this remote.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL of an external content source.

ca_cert.title: Ca cert
ca_cert.description: A string containing the PEM encoded CA certificate used to validate the server certificate presented by the remote server. All new line characters must be escaped. Returns SHA256 sum on GET.

client_cert.title: Client cert
client_cert.description: A string containing the PEM encoded client certificate used for authentication. All new line characters must be escaped. Returns SHA256 sum on GET.

client_key.title: Client key
client_key.description: A PEM encoded private key used for authentication. Returns SHA256 sum on GET.

tls_validation.title: Tls validation
tls_validation.description: If True, TLS peer validation must be performed.

pulp_last_updated.title: Pulp last updated
pulp_last_updated.description: Timestamp of the most recent update of the remote.

policy.title: Policy
policy.description: The policy to use when downloading content.
enum: When syncing, download all metadata and content now.

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for this remote.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL of an external content source.

ca_cert.title: Ca cert
ca_cert.description: A string containing the PEM encoded CA certificate used to validate the server certificate presented by the remote server. All new line characters must be escaped. Returns SHA256 sum on GET.

client_cert.title: Client cert
client_cert.description: A string containing the PEM encoded client certificate used for authentication. All new line characters must be escaped. Returns SHA256 sum on GET.

client_key.title: Client key
client_key.description: A PEM encoded private key used for authentication. Returns SHA256 sum on GET.

tls_validation.title: Tls validation
tls_validation.description: If True, TLS peer validation must be performed.

pulp_last_updated.title: Pulp last updated
pulp_last_updated.description: Timestamp of the most recent update of the remote.

policy.title: Policy
policy.description: The policy to use when downloading content.
enum: When syncing, download all metadata and content now.

requirements_file.title: Requirements file
requirements_file.description: The string version of Collection requirements yaml.

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for this repository.

add_content_units.description: A list of content units to add to a new repository version. This content is added after remove_content_units are removed.

remove_content_units.description: A list of content units to remove from the latest repository version. You may also specify '*' as an entry to remove all content. This content is removed before add_content_units are added.

base_version.title: Base version
base_version.description: A repository version whose content will be used as the initial set of content for the new repository version

remote.title: Remote
remote.description: A URI of the repository to be synchronized.

mirror.title: Mirror
mirror.description: If ``True``, synchronization will remove all content that is not present in the remote repository. If ``False``, sync will be additive only.

ContentSummary.title: Content summary
ContentSummary.description: Various count summaries of the content in the version and the HREF to view them.

base_version.title: Base version
base_version.description: A repository version whose content was used as the initial set of content for this repository version
